biography: Jonas, a name synonymous with dedication at Vantaan Golfpuisto, is known for his thoughtful approach to the game.

While Jonas may be considered retired from the Hector Trophée, his presence has been felt in past years. He has participated twice in the tournament, bringing with him a quiet intensity and a strategic mind. Though the Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have eluded him, his contributions to the spirit of the competition have been significant.
Although he is not expected to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, the world of golf knows that anything is possible until the first tee shot.
